  html_document:
    keep_md: true

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
library(xtable)
packages = sort(c("testthat", "quickcheck", "assertthat"))
null2empty = function(el) if (is.null(el)) "" else el
print(
  xtable(
  cbind(
    Title  = sapply(packages, function(x) packageDescription(x)$Title),
    Description = sapply(packages, function(x) packageDescription(x)$Description),
    Reference = sapply(packages, function(x) null2empty(packageDescription(x)$URL)))),
  type = "html")
```
